Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Yerobeyaamin Kumaaranaagiya Abiyaa Vyaadhiyil Vizhundhaan.

2 appozhudhu Yerobeyaam Than Manaiviyaip Paarththu: Nee Ezhundhu, Nee Yerobeyaamin Manaiviyendru Oruvarum Ariyaadhapadikku Veshammaari Seelovukkup Po; Indha Janaththinmel Naan Raajaavaaven Endru Ennode Sonna Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Agiyaa Ange Irukkiraan.
3 nee Un Kaiyile Paththu Appangalaiyum, Paniyaarangalaiyum, Oru Kalasam Thenaiyum Eduththukkondu Avanidaththukkup Po; Pillaikku Sambavikkappogiradhu Innadhendru Avan Unakku Arivippaan Endraan.
4 appadiye Yerobeyaamin Manaivi Seydhaal; Aval Ezhundhu Seelovukkup Poi, Agiyaavin Veettirkul Pravesiththaal; Agiyaavo Mudhir Vayadhaanadhinaal Avan Kangal Mangaladaindhu Paarkkak Koodaadhirundhaan.

5 karththar Agiyaavinidaththil: Idho, Yerobeyaamin Manaivi Vyaadhiyaayirukkira Than Kumaaranukkaaga Unnai Oru Viseshamketka Varugiraal; Nee Avalukku Inna Inna Pragaaramaaga Sollavendum; Aval Utpravesikkirapodhu, Thannai Anniya Sthreeyaagak Kaanbippaal Endraar.

6 aagaiyaal Vaasarpadikkul Pravesikkum Avaludaiya Nadaiyin Saththaththai Agiyaa Kettavudane, Avan: Yerobeyaamin Manaiviye, Ulle Vaa; Unnai Anniya Sthreeyaagak Kaanbikkiradhenna? Dhukkaseydhiyai Unakku Arivikka Naan Anuppappatten.
7 nee Poi Yerobeyaamai Nokki: Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Janaththinindru Unnai Naan Uyarththi, Unnai Isravel Ennum En Janaththinmel Adhipadhiyaaga Vaiththen.

8 naan Raajyabaaraththai Dhaaveedhu Vamsaththaarin Kaiyilirundhu Pidungi Unakkuk Koduththen; Aanaalum En Karpanaigalaik Kaikkondu, En Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhaiye Seyya Than Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Ennaip Pinpatrina En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhaip Pola Nee Iraamal,

9 unakku Munnirundha Ellaaraip Paarkkilum Pollaappu Seydhaai; Enakkuk Kobam Undaakka, Nee Poi Unakku Anniya Dhevargalaiyum Vaarkkappatta Vikkiragangalaiyum Undupanni, Unakkup Purambe Ennaith Thallivittaai.

10 aagaiyaal Idho, Naan Yerobeyaamudaiya Veettinmel Pollaappai Varappanni, Yerobeyaamukku, Suvarmel Neervidum Oru Naai Mudhalaayiraadhapadikku, Isravelile Adaipattavanaiyum Vidupattavanaiyum Sangaarampanni, Kuppai Kazhiththuppodappadugiradhu Pola Yerobeyaamin Pinnadiyaarai Avargal Kattode Atrup Pogumattum Kazhiththuppoduven Endraar.
11 yerobeyaamin Sandhadhiyaaril Pattanaththile Saagiravanai Naaigal Thinnum; Veliyile Saagiravanai Aagaayaththin Paravaigal Thinnum; Karththar Idhai Uraiththaar.
12 aagaiyaal Nee Ezhundhu, Un Veettukkup Po, Un Kaalgal Pattanaththirkul Pravesikkaiyil Pillaiyaandaan Seththuppovaan.

13 avanukkaaga Isravelarellaarum Dhukkankondaadi Avanai Adakkampannuvaargal; Yerobeyaamin Veettaaril Isravelil Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Munbaaga Avanidaththile Nalla Kaariyam Kaanappattadhinaal, Yerobeyaamin Sandhadhiyil Avan Oruvane Kallaraikkutpaduvaan.
14 aanaalum Karththar Thamakku Isravelinmel Oru Raajaavai Ezhumbappannuvaar; Avan Annaalile Yerobeyaamin Veettaarai Sangarippaan; Ippodhe Idhu Nadandherum.

15 thanneerile Naanal Asaigiradhu Pola, Karththar Isravelai Muriththasaiyappanni, Avargal Pidhaakkalukkuth Thaam Koduththa Indha Nalla Dhesaththilirundhu Isravelai Verode Pidungi, Avargal Thangalukku Thoppu Vikkiragangalai Vaiththu, Karththarukkuk Kobam Undaakkinapadiyinaal, Avargalai Nadhikkappaale Sidharadiththu,
16 yerobeyaam Seydhadhum Isravelai Seyyappanninadhumaana Paavaththinimiththam Isravelai Oppukkoduththuviduvaar Endraan.
17 appozhudhu Yerobeyaamin Manaivi Ezhundhu Purappattu Thirsaavukku Vandhaal; Aval Vaasarpadiyile Varugaiyil Pillaiyaandaan Seththupponaan.
18 karththar Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Agiyaa Ennum Thamadhu Oozhiyakkaaranaik Kondu Sonna Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Avargal Avanai Adakkampanni, Isravelar Ellaarum Avanukkaaga Dhukkankondaadinaargal.
19 yerobeyaam Yuththampanninadhum Aandadhumaana Avanudaiya Matra Varththamaanangal Isravel Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
20 yerobeyaam Raajyabaarampannina Kaalam Irubaththirandu Varusham; Avan Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Naadhaab Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.

21 saalomonin Kumaaranaagiya Regobeyaam Yoodhaavile Raajyabaaram Panninaan; Regobeyaam Raajaavaagirapodhu Naarpaththoru Vayadhaayirundhu, Karththar Thammudaiya Naamam Vilangumpadi Isravel Koththirangalilellaam Therindhukonda Nagaramaagiya Erusalemile Padhinezhuvarusham Raajyabaarampanninaan; Ammon Jaadhiyaana Avanudaiya Thaayinper Naamaal.

22 yoodhaajanangal Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu, Thaangal Seydhuvarugira Thangaludaiya Paavangalinaal Thangal Pidhaakkal Seydha Ellaavatraippaarkkilum Avarukku Adhiga Erichchalai Moottinaargal.
23 avargalum Uyarndha Sagala Mettin Melum, Pachchaiyaana Sagala Maraththinkeezhum, Medaigalaiyum Silaigalaiyum Thoppu Vikkiragangalaiyum Thangalukku Undaakkinaargal.
24 dhesaththile Lachchaiyaana Punarchchikkaararum Irundhaargal; Karththar Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaagath Thuraththivitta Jaadhigaludaiya Aruvaruppugalin Padiyellaam Seydhaargal.
25 regobeyaam Raajyabaarampannum Aindhaam Varushaththile, Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Seeshaak Erusalemukku Virodhamaai Vandhu,
26 karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Pokkishangalaiyum, Raajaavudaiya Aramanaiyin Pokkishangalaiyum, Saalomon Seyviththa Pon Parisaigal Aagiya Sagalaththaiyum Eduththukkondu Poivittaan.
27 avaigalukkup Padhilaaga Raajaavaagiya Regobeyaam Vengalap Parisaigalai Seyviththu, Avaigalai Raajaavin Vaasarpadiyaik Kaakkira Sevagarudaiya Thalaivarin Kaiyil Oppuviththaan.
28 raajaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkul Pravesikkumpodhu, Aramanai Sevagar Avaigalaip Pidiththukkondu Poi, Thirumbath Thangal Araiyile Vaippaargal.
29 regobeyaamin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydhavai Yaavum, Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
30 regobeyaamukkum Yerobeyaamukkum Avargal Irundha Naatkalilellaam Yuththam Nadandhukondirundhadhu.

31 regobeyaam Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhu, Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Than Pidhaakkalandaiyil Adakkampannappattaan; Ammon Jaadhiyaana Avan Thaaikku Naamaal Endru Per; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Abiyaam Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
